entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
